name: Night Maniac (DEMO)
description:
A game that tells the story of a butcher shop boss, with a murderous ex-butcher who did not accept his own resignation and imprisonment, the killer is loose, ready to kill anyone who comes in his way without hesitation, in the demo you play as an butcher that as always was supposed to be just another normal day at work, but tonight was different ...

Mode: Single player video game

Genres: Horror

Platforms: Microsoft Windows

Studios: Noxus Games Studio, Noxus Entertainment

Developer: Diego Victor / ZERO

The songs were created by the developer, the game does not contain copyrights


Requirements:

Minimum:

Ram: 4GB

GPU: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 550 Ti

Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo

Recommended:

Ram: 6GB

GPU: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650

Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad
